properties.name: app.security.required-role
properties.description: Role required to access secured endpoints in the frontend application. Defaults to 'my-role'.

properties.name: calendar.service.url
properties.description: Base URL of the calendar service used by the frontend. Defaults to 'http://localhost:9090'.

properties.name: app.security.require-2fa
properties.description: Flag to enforce two-factor authentication (2FA). Set to 'true' to require 2FA, else 'false'.
